K10D0216_H0217:410b-8: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-9: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10D0216_H0217:410b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-12: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i le'u the tshom thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-13: 'gyod pa thams cad sel bar byed pa /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-14: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sbyong bar byed pa /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-15: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-18: de ltar khyod gang gi tshe na lha dang /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-19: lha ma yin gyi g-yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la soms shig /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-21: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsams na lha rnams ni rgyal /
K10D0216_H0217:410b-22: lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar re bar bya'o //
K10D0216_H0217:410b-23: koo shi ka khyod la bsgo'o //
K10D0216_H0217:410b-24: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0216_H0217:410b-30: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na phyir rgol ba'am /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-1: klan ka tshol zhing glags lta ba las glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-4: rgyal po'i pho brang du song yang rung /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-5: rkun po'i nang du song yang rung /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-6: gtum po'i nang du song yang rung /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-7: dgra'i nang du song yang rung /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-8: phyir rgol ba'i nang du song yang rung /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-12: chu'i nang dud song yang rung ste /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam par bya'o //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-14: de ltar byas na klan ka tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; dga' bo /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-16: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-23: rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0216_H0217:411a-24: 'di khyod las thos nas the tshom thams cad gcod
K10D0216_H0217:411a-25: par gyur ro // de dag gi nem nur thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-26: 'gyod pa thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-28: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas glags par bya mi nus par 'gyur te /
K10D0216_H0217:411a-29: gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nges par
K10D0216_H0217:411a-30: mnyan par bya ba de dag ni chos kyi rnam
K10D0216_H0217:411a-31: grangs 'di ma thos par 'chi ba'i dus byed par
K10D0216_H0217:411a-32: mi 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na //
K10D0216_H0217:411a-34: 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos yin te /
K10D0216_H0217:411b-0: 'di thos ma @411b thag tu the tshom thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0216_H0217:411b-3: gang mtshams med pa byed pas kyang chos kyi rnam
K10D0216_H0217:411b-4: grangs 'di la 'jug cing mos par byed na las
K10D0216_H0217:411b-5: de'i las kyi sgrib pa yod par nga mi smra'o
K10D0216_H0217:411b-6: // de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0216_H0217:411b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bdag mngon sum du mchi ste /
K10D0216_H0217:411b-9: gang gi tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
K10D0216_H0217:411b-10: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab tu zas 'tshal cing
K10D0216_H0217:411b-11: mtshams ma mchis pa'i mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'i chos
K10D0216_H0217:411b-12: kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na rgyal po ma
K10D0216_H0217:411b-13: skyes dgras mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob cing
K10D0216_H0217:411b-14: de'i 'gyod pa byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K10D0216_H0217:411b-17: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa thams cad kyi chos
K10D0216_H0217:411b-18: nyid ni gang rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa
K10D0216_H0217:411b-21: byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo dag ni
K10D0216_H0217:411b-22: de ltar chos rang bzhin gyis zhi ba la bdag
K10D0216_H0217:411b-23: dang / bdag gir rnam par brtags nas lta ba 'byung bar bgyid cing /
K10D0216_H0217:411b-24: ci ltar rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa bzhin
K10D0216_H0217:411b-25: du mtshams med pa bgyid pa thams cad kyi rang
K10D0216_H0217:411b-26: bzhin de 'dra ba lags par ni ma 'tshal te
K10D0216_H0217:411b-27: / phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur cing /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-1: mchis pa la yongs su rtogs pas btags pa rnams
K10D0216_H0217:412a-2: ni ma mchis bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang
K10D0216_H0217:412a-3: / byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-6: bdag ni gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de dag la ltung ba ma mchis /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-7: ltung ba'i chos can ma lags so snyam bgyid do //
K10D0216_H0217:412a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-13: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med do //
K10D0216_H0217:412a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0216_H0217:412a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0216_H0217:412a-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci nas kyang phyi ma'i
K10D0216_H0217:412a-19: dus phyi ma'i tshe na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0216_H0217:412a-20: spyod par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-21: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang
K10D0216_H0217:412a-22: gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar gyur
K10D0216_H0217:412a-23: pa'i 'od de lta bu g-yas phyogs dang /
K10D0216_H0217:412a-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs
K10D0216_H0217:412a-26: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0216_H0217:412b-0: rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin @412b gyis
K10D0216_H0217:412b-1: brlabs so zhes de skad kyi sgra byung ngo //
K10D0216_H0217:412b-2: gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par
K10D0216_H0217:412b-3: 'gyur ba de dag ni gal te rgya mtsho mchid
K10D0216_H0217:412b-4: rnam chen po'i nang du mchis par gyur kyang rung
K10D0216_H0217:412b-5: / sreg pa'i bskal pa'i nang du mchis kyang rung ste /
K10D0216_H0217:412b-6: sems can de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0216_H0217:412b-7: ma thos par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur
K10D0216_H0217:412b-8: ro // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0216_H0217:412b-11: ji ltar sgra byung ba bzhin te /
K10D0216_H0217:412b-12: skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
K10D0216_H0217:412b-13: de dag gi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi
K10D0216_H0217:412b-14: ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe la spyod par 'gyur ro
K10D0216_H0217:412b-15: // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
K10D0216_H0217:412b-17: mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa
K10D0216_H0217:412b-18: drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
K10D0216_H0217:412b-19: dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10D0216_H0217:412b-20: srog chags 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni bla
K10D0216_H0217:412b-21: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0216_H0217:412b-23: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum
K10D0216_H0217:412b-24: ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so
K10D0216_H0217:412b-25: // srog chags brgyad stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur to //
K10D0216_H0217:412b-26: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10D0216_H0217:412b-27: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyang chos kyi rnam
K10D0216_H0217:412b-28: grangs 'di'i mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur te
K10D0216_H0217:413a-0: / sil snyan brgya stong dkrol bar byed cing @413a *//
K10D0216_H0217:413a-1: gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0216_H0217:413a-2: bstan pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
K10D0216_H0217:413a-3: mchog yin no // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las
K10D0216_H0217:413a-4: ni mu stegs can gzhan klan ka la spyod pa
K10D0216_H0217:413a-5: mchog yin no // / bdud kyi yul la gnas pa thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10D0216_H0217:413a-6: yang dag pa'i chos la mos pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10D0216_H0217:413a-7: rigs kyi bu mo dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs
K10D0216_H0217:413a-8: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0216_H0217:413a-9: rgyas kyis phyag rgya 'di bzhag ste /
K10D0216_H0217:413a-10: gang dag gis phyag rgya 'di shes pa de dag
K10D0216_H0217:413a-11: ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
K10D0216_H0217:413a-12: par 'gyur ro zhes de skad kyang smra'o //
K10D0216_H0217:413a-13: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal ba dang /
K10D0216_H0217:413a-14: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K10D0216_H0217:413a-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang
K10D0216_H0217:413a-16: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang
K10D0216_H0217:413a-20: moonggal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0216_H0217:413a-24: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10D0216_H0217:413a-25: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
